name: Touchdown Troubles
description:
A game made for minijam 75. With the limitation: Weight must be a mechanic

You must land the rocket safely. Use the thrusters to lower the speed before hitting the ground. The indicators on the bottom right turn red when your velocity is too high for landing.

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Click and drag boxes with the mouse to move them
  • Stand on the red buttons to activate the thrusters
